sentence.Network_en: The soil washed from the hills is silting up the hydroelectric dams.

sentence.Network_en: Plans are being drawn up to build a hydroelectric station here.
sentence.Network_cn: 这里正筹划建设一座水力发电站.

sentence.Network_cn: 这台机器使用的是水力发电的能量.

entry.tran: 水力发电的;（电）由水力发的
entry.def: Hydroelectric means relating to or involving electricity made from the energy of running water.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or used in the production of electricity by waterpower;
